Event.Text: A public broadcast is picked up by the rover comms. A robotic voice requests, "This is a public request from the MSS organization. A bounty has been placed on Razor and his Bloodhound Bandits. Crimes listed, Homicide, Aggravated Robbery, Extortion, and Public Indecency. Reward, sufficient living supplies. Return message for last known coordinates"

Choice.Text: Accept bounty, spending an extra day to hunt the bandits
